articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Search for missing flight MH370 suspended due to bad weather, says Malaysia transport minister - AOL.com
articles.description: The search for the wreckage of the missing Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 in the southern Indian Ocean has been suspended due to poor weather conditions and ...
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - The search for the wreckage of the missing Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 in the southern Indian Ocean has been suspended due to poor weather conditions and will only resume … [+1584 chars]
